title: COVID-19 vaccine
author: University Marketing; Communications
cleaned_text: Academic Resources Campus Resources University Resources Information For DePaul University Newsline > Sections > Campus and Community > COVID-19 vaccine By University Marketing and Communications / March 19, 2021 / Posted in: CAMPUS AND COMMUNITY / Twitter / Facebook State of Illinois eligibility and access City of Chicago eligibility and access City and state officials urge patience in seeking appointments, particularly after the next eligibility periods open. While supplies are expected to increase, the demand may make it difficult to find an appointment until May. DePaul will continue to share more information as it becomes available.
